message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_DECISION_EXISTS
message.locale: A decision has already been created for this case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_NOT_ACTIVE
message.locale: Decisions can only be maintained for active appeals.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_FINAL_HEARING_NOT_HELD
message.locale: A decision cannot be entered as the final hearing has not been held for this appeal case.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_DATE_TOO_EARLY
message.locale: The decision date cannot be earlier than the hearing date.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_DECISION_SUBMITTED
message.locale: The decision has already been submitted for approval.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_DATE_MISSING
message.locale: The decision date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_APPEALDECISION_FV_DATE_FUTURE
message.locale: The decision date can not be in the future.
